text: Mũrangĩri wa njeera akĩarahũka, na rĩrĩa aarorire akĩona mĩrango ya njeera ĩrĩ mĩhingũku, akĩruta rũhiũ rwake rwa njora akĩenda kwĩyũraga tondũ eeciiririe atĩ andũ arĩa moohetwo nĩmoorĩte.16:27 Mũndũ muohe angĩorire njeera, mũthigari nĩwe woragagwo, nĩkĩo mũthigari ũyũ endaga kwĩyũraga o kabere.
